page.title: 15Anglican Church, Rangeworthy
page.content: {There is a church}in Rangeworthy called Holy Trinity. This is in the parish of Rangeworthy which is now joined to the parish of Wickwar. The Rector of Wickwar looks after both parishes and has a Curate. {There follows a summary of the work of {a clergyman}in the Church of England as described to us by the Curate. {The most important part of a priest's {work}is to meet the spiritual needs of the people and spread the message of Christianity. The priest takes services, visits sick people and those in hospital and he gives teaching about the Church to all age groups. {The training of a priest}takes 4 years and involves studying the Old and New Testaments, Doctrine and Liturgies. At present, only men can become priests in the Church of England.
